companies.name: OpenAI
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Users retain ownership of Input and Output; OpenAI can use Content for service improvement. [AI Usage]: Output may not be accurate; human review is recommended. [Liability]: OpenAI not liable for decisions based on Output.

companies.name: Anthropic
companies.summary: [AI Usage]: User conversations may be used to train Anthropic's AI models. [Liability]: Anthropic limits liability for AI-generated content.

companies.name: Midjourney
companies.summary: [AI Usage]: User-generated images used to improve AI models without opt-out. [Data Rights]: Personal and billing info collected.

companies.name: Google
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Broad data collection with worldwide usage license granted to Google. [AI Usage]: Content used to train AI systems.

companies.name: Microsoft
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Users retain ownership of their content but grant Microsoft a worldwide, royalty-free license to use it. [AI Usage]: Users must adhere to conduct rules when using AI services. [Liability]: Microsoft is not responsible for user-generated content.

companies.name: Meta
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Meta uses personal data for personalized ads but does not sell or share identifiable information without consent. [AI Usage]: Advanced technologies, including AI, enhance user experience and safety. [Liability]: Meta may access and share user data for legal compliance and safety.

companies.name: X (Twitter)
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: User data transferred internationally with varying protections. [AI Usage]: Content licensed for AI training without explicit opt-out.

companies.name: TikTok
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Extensive data collection including device settings and activity. [AI Usage]: Data used for personalization; may be transferred internationally.

companies.name: LinkedIn
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Personal data shared with Microsoft and affiliates. [Liability]: Disputes resolved via mandatory arbitration; class action rights waived.

companies.name: Instagram
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: User data may be collected and used for service improvement. [AI Usage]: AI may be employed for personalized experiences. [Liability]: Company limits liability for indirect damages.

companies.name: Pinterest
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Users retain content rights; Pinterest uses data for personalization. [Liability]: Distributed content may not be fully removed on request.

companies.name: Reddit
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Users consent to data collection per Privacy Policy. [AI Usage]: Content licensed for AI training; arbitration required for disputes.

companies.name: Discord
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Extensive data collection includes monitoring active apps and games. [Liability]: Class action rights waived via arbitration clause.

companies.name: Slack
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Data ownership for platform content is ambiguous. [Liability]: Business data governed by customer agreements; arbitration required.

companies.name: Zoom
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Personal info required; extent of data usage unclear. [AI Usage]: Meeting content may be processed for AI features.

companies.name: Notion
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Extensive personal info and usage data collected. [Liability]: Data deletion requests subject to retention policy timelines.

[Data Rights]: Customer Data controlled by Customer; Asana has no liability for Customer Data management.  
[AI Usage]: No specific AI usage terms mentioned.  
[Liability]: Asana not liable for unauthorized account use or Customer Data disputes.

companies.name: GitHub
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Users own content but GitHub holds broad usage rights. [AI Usage]: Public repositories may be used to train AI.

companies.name: Amazon
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Users retain ownership of their data; company may use data for service improvement. [AI Usage]: AI tools may analyze user data. [Liability]: Company limits liability for service interruptions.

companies.name: Walmart
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Personal data collection scope unspecified in terms. [Liability]: No explicit user consent mechanisms for data collection identified.

companies.name: Shopify
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Extensive personal and business data required for merchant use. [Liability]: Broad data licensing rights granted to Shopify.

companies.name: Netflix
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Device and payment data collected for promotional eligibility. [Liability]: Disputes resolved via mandatory arbitration; legal recourse limited.

companies.name: Disney+
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Extensive viewing habits and device data collected. [Liability]: Parental controls required for accounts linked to minors.

companies.name: Spotify
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Listening data used for personalization and recommendations. [Liability]: Mandatory arbitration waives class action rights for users.

companies.name: Twitch
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Data collection practices referenced but not detailed in terms. [AI Usage]: Streamed content may be archived and reused by Twitch.

companies.name: YouTube
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Content processed per YouTube Data Processing Terms. [AI Usage]: AI training use governed by separate terms not listed here.

companies.name: Hulu
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: User data shared with third-party advertisers. [Liability]: Users cannot fully opt out of third-party data sharing.

companies.name: Max
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Scope of personal data collection unclear in terms. [Liability]: Subscription cancellation may not immediately halt all data use.

companies.name: Uber
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Extensive location and ride data collected for operations. [Liability]: Binding arbitration waives jury trial and class action rights.

companies.name: Airbnb
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: User data subject to international transfers and processing. [Liability]: Class action rights waived via mandatory arbitration agreement.

companies.name: DoorDash
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Terms inaccessible; data handling practices unknown. [Liability]: Users unaware of rights due to missing service terms.

companies.name: Lyft
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Extensive location, ride, and user preference data collected. [Liability]: Mandatory arbitration limits disputes to individual claims only.

companies.name: Grubhub
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Accounts may be created from transactions without explicit consent. [AI Usage]: Order history used for personalization and marketing.

companies.name: TaskRabbit
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Personal data usage governed by Privacy Policy. [AI Usage]: No explicit AI usage. [Liability]: Taskrabbit not liable for Tasker actions.

companies.name: JPMorgan Chase
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: User data shared with JPMorgan group and third parties. [Liability]: Broad data-sharing consent required to access services.

companies.name: PayPal
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Transaction data used for fraud detection. [Liability]: Disputes resolved via individual arbitration; class action rights waived.

companies.name: Stripe
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Data collection scope unclear for business users. [Liability]: Merchants responsible for customer data compliance obligations.

companies.name: Venmo
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Extensive personal and financial data collected. [Liability]: Social transaction history publicly visible by default.

companies.name: Robinhood
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Limited clarity on investment data collection practices. [Liability]: Disputes resolved via mandatory arbitration; limited legal recourse.

companies.name: Coinbase
companies.summary: [Data Rights]: Transaction data used for compliance and analytics. [Liability]: Arbitration waives class action and jury trial rights.
